chapter_description.p: The Double Type module provides tools for handling double-precision numeric values in Nelson.

It enables conversion to double precision and offers access to key numeric limits, supporting high-accuracy computations and reliable handling of large or small floating-point numbers in mathematical and scientific applications.

keyword.name: double
keyword.description: Converts a variable to double precision type.

keyword.name: flintmax
keyword.description: Largest consecutive integer in floating-point format.
